name: Hungry Maw
desc:
Your arm painfully transforms into the maw of an unknown creature, which bites down on a 15 foot long, 5 foot wide line. Creatures in the path must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d10 arcane damage. Creatures that succeed take half damage.

You take 3 damage when you cast this spell.
empower: Damage increased to 4d10. Self damage increased to 4.
author: CrusaderDroid
